comments:
Hello,
I'm testing the VE I20050719 driver and I'm unable to open a visual class
created with the VE I20050715 diver and I can open it without problems with VE
1.0.2.2 driver.
The error message says 'An internal error occurred during: "Setup Java Visual
Editor"'.

And the log file contains:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2005-07-20 07:37:00.796
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Setup Java Visual Editor".
!STACK 0
java.lang.StackOverflowError
    at
org.eclipse.jem.internal.instantiation.base.JavaObjectInstance.migrate(JavaObjectInstance.java:199)

    at

    at

    at

Two issues here, we were modling primitives for BeanParts, and also not
resolving instances correctly causing allocation trees to have loops in them
(see Bug 104803).  For 1.1 we ensured we will not loop.
VE 1.1 is released. Moving to closed.
